bibl.title: K voprosu o pojavlenii i nacal'nom etape rasprostranenija imitacij afinskikh monet na Vostoke v konce V-IV v. do n.e. Avec résumé en anglais: Towards the Origin and Spread of Imitations of Athenian Coins in the East in 5th-4th centuries BC.
bibl.note: STRELKOV A.V., K voprosu o pojavlenii i nacal'nom etape rasprostranenija imitacij afinskikh monet na Vostoke v konce V-IV v. do n.e. Avec résumé en anglais: Towards the Origin and Spread of Imitations of Athenian Coins in the East in 5th-4th centuries BC.
VDI 263 (2007, fasc. 4) pp. 139-155, 2 pll. (reproductions de monnaies).
